promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi young mythical lion normal-type pokemon wearing golden gemstones. It can be found in grassland-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, normal or lion. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Jewelroara, a a chibi young mythical lion normal-type pokemon. It can be found in grassland-like environments It has the following abilities: Loop Cannon. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "lion", "normal" or "Jewelroara". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of normal-type pokemon, lion-like, mythical, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, silver galaxy background
generatedDescription: This pint-sized regal feline roams the lush grasslands, dazzling opponents with its Loop Cannon and a mane that shimmers with gemstone-like hues.
